_sText:
This is some dumb map that is too long and probably too difficult for you.  It is really boring because you can't speedrun it in under a minute and you need actual strafe skill instead of prespeed grind.  Gameplay is really bad because you can jump on the same platform twice.

Features:
-Large filesize will discourage players joining the server, leaving you to play in peace.
-Deliberate anger/confusion-inducing design choices.
-Difficulty scaling that can't appeal to all players.
-Large map size (100% brush count) gives plenty of content to nitpick and complain about.
